title: Pivoting Your Brand
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Pivoting Your Brand.

hook.text: You're known as the 'finance person' but want to pivot to tech. How do you rebrand without starting over?

discovery.text: Herminia Ibarra's research shows identity transitions happen through experimenting, not planning.

twist.text: Don't announce a pivot. Start doing the new thing publicly while still doing the old thing.

climax.text: Over months, your content, projects, and conversations shift â€” and so does how people see you.

punchline.text: Don't rebrand overnight. Transition in public, over time.
